tasks.task: Load a trailer with bales of hay.
subtasks: Approach the bale stack.
Lift a bale onto the trailer.
Place the bale onto the trailer.
Secure the bale on the trailer to prevent movement.

tasks.task: Drive the tractor to the field.
subtasks: Get into the tractor seat.
Start the tractor engine.
Navigate the tractor to the field.

tasks.task: Mow the lawn.
subtasks: Position the mower at the starting point.
Activate the mower.
Operate the mower along the intended path.
Adjust the mower direction as needed.

tasks.task: Unload hay from the trailer to the storage.
subtasks: Stop the trailer near the storage location.
Open the trailer doors.
Remove the securely placed bales.
Place the bales into the storage.

tasks.task: Securely fasten the trailer to a pole.
subtasks: Identify an appropriate pole.
Align the trailer with the pole.
Attach the trailer to the pole using straps or chains.

tasks.task: Unload hay bales from the trailer.
subtasks: Open the trailer's roll-up door.
Remove the bales from the trailer one by one.
Stack the bales in the designated area.

tasks.task: Refill the tractor's fuel tank.
subtasks: Locate the fuel nozzle.
Connect the fuel hose to the tractor.
Fill the fuel tank to the desired level.
Disconnect the hose and store it properly.

tasks.task: Drive the tractor to the barn.
subtasks: Navigate the tractor from the field back to the barn.
Park the tractor in the designated area of the barn.

tasks.task: Check the trailer's stability when unloaded.
subtasks: Ensure the trailer is not pulling to one side.
Secure any loose items in the trailer.

tasks.task: Attach the mower to the tractor.
subtasks: Remove the mower from storage.
Connect the mower to the tractor's drawbar.
Tighten the hitch for stability.

tasks.task: Conduct a pre-trip inspection of the tractor.
subtasks: Check the tire pressure.
Inspect the lubrication levels.
Examine the brakes and steering.
Ensure the lights are working.

tasks.task: Drive the tractor to another field.
subtasks: Position the tractor on the path to the next field.
Start the tractor once arrived.
Drive to the new field.

tasks.task: Wait for the tractor to cool down before refueling.
subtasks: Allow time for the tractor's components to cool.
Check the fuel gauge to determine if refueling is necessary.
